description: Schema validation for the AWX CRD

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

additional_labels.description: Additional labels defined on the resource, which should be propagated to child resources

admin_password_secret.description: Secret where the admin password can be found

admin_user.description: Username to use for the admin account

affinity.description: If specified, the pod's scheduling constraints

annotations.description: Common annotations for both Web and Task deployments.

api_urlpattern_prefix.description: An optional configuration to add a prefix in the API URL path

auto_upgrade.description: Should AWX instances be automatically upgraded when operator gets upgraded

broadcast_websocket_secret.description: Secret where the broadcast websocket secret can be found

bundle_cacert_secret.description: Secret where can be found the trusted Certificate Authority Bundle

ca_trust_bundle.description: Path where the trusted CA bundle is available

control_plane_ee_image.description: Registry path to the Execution Environment container image to use on control plane pods

control_plane_priority_class.description: Assign a preexisting priority class to the control plane pods

create_preload_data.description: Whether or not to preload data upon instance creation

csrf_cookie_secure.description: Set csrf cookie secure mode for web

development_mode.description: If the deployment should be done in development mode

ee_extra_volume_mounts.description: Specify volume mounts to be added to Execution container

ee_images.description: Registry path to the Execution Environment container to use

ee_pull_credentials_secret.description: Secret where pull credentials for registered ees can be found

ee_resource_requirements.description: Resource requirements for the ee container

extra_settings.description: Extra settings to specify for AWX

extra_settings_files.description: Extra ConfigMaps or Secrets of settings files to specify for AWX

extra_volumes.description: Specify extra volumes to add to the application pod

garbage_collect_secrets.description: Whether or not to remove secrets upon instance removal

image.description: Registry path to the application container to use

image_pull_secret.description: (Deprecated) Image pull secret for app and database containers

image_pull_secrets.description: Image pull secrets for app and database containers

image_version.description: Application container image version to use

ingress_annotations.description: Annotations to add to the Ingress Controller

ingress_api_version.description: The Ingress API version to use

ingress_class_name.description: The name of ingress class to use instead of the cluster default.

ingress_controller.description: Special configuration for specific Ingress Controllers

tls_secret.description: Secret where the Ingress TLS secret can be found

ingress_path.description: The ingress path used to reach the deployed service

ingress_path_type.description: The ingress path type for the deployed service

ingress_tls_secret.description: (Deprecated) Secret where the Ingress TLS secret can be found

ingress_type.description: The ingress type to use to reach the deployed instance

init_container_extra_commands.description: Extra commands for the init container

init_container_extra_volume_mounts.description: Specify volume mounts to be added to the init container

init_container_image.description: Registry path to the init container to use

init_container_image_version.description: Init container image version to use

init_container_resource_requirements.description: Resource requirements for the init container

init_projects_container_image.description: Registry path to the init projects container to use

ipv6_disabled.description: Disable web container's nginx ipv6 listener

ldap_cacert_secret.description: Secret where can be found the LDAP trusted Certificate Authority Bundle

ldap_password_secret.description: Secret where can be found the LDAP bind password

loadbalancer_port.description: Port to use for the loadbalancer

loadbalancer_protocol.description: Protocol to use for the loadbalancer

metrics_utility_console_enabled.description: Enable metrics utility shipping to Red Hat Hybrid Cloud Console

nginx_listen_queue_size.description: Set the socket listen queue size for nginx (defaults to same as uwsgi)

nginx_worker_connections.description: Set the number of connections per worker for nginx

nginx_worker_cpu_affinity.description: Set the CPU affinity for nginx workers

nginx_worker_processes.description: Set the number of workers for nginx

nodeport_port.description: Port to use for the nodeport

old_postgres_configuration_secret.description: Secret where the old database configuration can be found for data migration

postgres_configuration_secret.description: Secret where the database configuration can be found

postgres_data_volume_init.description: Sets permissions on the /var/lib/pgdata/data for postgres container using an init container (not Openshift)

postgres_extra_volume_mounts.description: Specify volume mounts to be added to Postgres container

postgres_extra_volumes.description: Specify extra volumes to add to the application pod

postgres_image.description: Registry path to the PostgreSQL container to use

postgres_image_version.description: PostgreSQL container image version to use

postgres_init_container_commands.description: Customize the postgres init container commands (Non Openshift)

postgres_init_container_resource_require.description: (Deprecated, use postgres_resource_requirements parameter) Resource requirements for the postgres init container

postgres_keep_pvc_after_upgrade.description: Specify whether or not to keep the old PVC after PostgreSQL upgrades

postgres_keepalives.description: Controls whether client-side TCP keepalives are used for Postgres connections.

postgres_keepalives_count.description: Controls the number of TCP keepalives that can be lost before the client's connection to the server is considered dead.

postgres_keepalives_idle.description: Controls the number of seconds of inactivity after which TCP should send a keepalive message to the server.

postgres_keepalives_interval.description: Controls the number of seconds after which a TCP keepalive message that is not acknowledged by the server should be retransmitted.

postgres_label_selector.description: Label selector used to identify postgres pod for data migration

postgres_priority_class.description: Assign a preexisting priority class to the postgres pod

postgres_resource_requirements.description: Resource requirements for the PostgreSQL container

postgres_security_context_settings.description: Key/values that will be set under the pod-level securityContext field

postgres_storage_class.description: Storage class to use for the PostgreSQL PVC

postgres_storage_requirements.description: Storage requirements for the PostgreSQL container

postgres_tolerations.description: node tolerations for the Postgres pods

projects_persistence.description: Whether or not the /var/lib/projects directory will be persistent

receptor_log_level.description: Set log level of receptor service

redis_image.description: Registry path to the redis container to use

redis_image_version.description: Redis container image version to use

redis_resource_requirements.description: Resource requirements for the redis container

route_api_version.description: The route API version to use

route_host.description: The DNS to use to points to the instance

route_tls_secret.description: Secret where the TLS related credentials are stored

route_tls_termination_mechanism.description: The secure TLS termination mechanism to use

rsyslog_extra_volume_mounts.description: Specify volume mounts to be added to the Rsyslog container

rsyslog_resource_requirements.description: Resource requirements for the rsyslog container

secret_key_secret.description: Secret where the secret key can be found

security_context_settings.description: Key/values that will be set under the pod-level securityContext field

service_annotations.description: Annotations to add to the service

service_labels.description: Additional labels to apply to the service

service_type.description: The service type to be used on the deployed instance

session_cookie_secure.description: Set session cookie secure mode for web

set_self_labels.description: Maintain some of the recommended `app.kubernetes.io/*` labels on the resource (self)

task_affinity.description: If specified, the pod's scheduling constraints

task_annotations.description: Task deployment annotations. This will override the general annotations parameter for the Task deployment.

task_extra_volume_mounts.description: Specify volume mounts to be added to Task container

task_liveness_failure_threshold.description: Number of consecutive failure events to identify failure of task pod

task_liveness_initial_delay.description: Initial delay before starting liveness checks on task pod

task_liveness_period.description: Time period in seconds between each liveness check for the task pod

task_liveness_timeout.description: Number of seconds to wait for a probe response from task pod

task_manage_replicas.description: Enables operator control of replicas count for the task deployment when set to 'true'

task_privileged.description: If a privileged security context should be enabled

task_readiness_failure_threshold.description: Number of consecutive failure events to identify failure of task pod

task_readiness_initial_delay.description: Initial delay before starting readiness checks on task pod

task_readiness_period.description: Time period in seconds between each readiness check for the task pod

task_readiness_timeout.description: Number of seconds to wait for a probe response from task pod

task_resource_requirements.description: Resource requirements for the task container

task_tolerations.description: node tolerations for the task pods

task_topology_spread_constraints.description: topology rule(s) for the task pods

termination_grace_period_seconds.description: Optional duration in seconds pods needs to terminate gracefully

uwsgi_listen_queue_size.description: Set the socket listen queue size for uwsgi

uwsgi_processes.description: Set the number of uwsgi processes to run in a web container

web_affinity.description: If specified, the pod's scheduling constraints

web_annotations.description: Web deployment annotations. This will override the general annotations parameter for the Web deployment.

web_extra_volume_mounts.description: Specify volume mounts to be added to the Web container

web_liveness_failure_threshold.description: Number of consecutive failure events to identify failure of web pod

web_liveness_initial_delay.description: Initial delay before starting liveness checks on web pod

web_liveness_period.description: Time period in seconds between each liveness check for the web pod

web_liveness_timeout.description: Number of seconds to wait for a probe response from web pod

web_manage_replicas.description: Enables operator control of replicas count for the web deployment when set to 'true'

web_readiness_failure_threshold.description: Number of consecutive failure events to identify failure of web pod

web_readiness_initial_delay.description: Initial delay before starting readiness checks on web pod

web_readiness_period.description: Time period in seconds between each readiness check for the web pod

web_readiness_timeout.description: Number of seconds to wait for a probe response from web pod

web_resource_requirements.description: Resource requirements for the web container

web_tolerations.description: node tolerations for the web pods

web_topology_spread_constraints.description: topology rule(s) for the web pods

URL.description: URL to access the deployed instance

adminPasswordSecret.description: Admin password secret name of the deployed instance

adminUser.description: Admin user of the deployed instance

broadcastWebsocketSecret.description: Broadcast websocket secret name of the deployed instance

conditions.description: The resulting conditions when a Service Telemetry is instantiated

image.description: URL of the image used for the deployed instance

migratedFromSecret.description: The secret used for migrating an old instance

postgresConfigurationSecret.description: Postgres Configuration secret name of the deployed instance

secretKeySecret.description: Secret key secret name of the deployed instance

upgradedPostgresVersion.description: Status to indicate that the database has been upgraded to the version in the status
